short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Limit Social Network usage to help prevent social media addiction and promote healthier browsing habits.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you find yourself endlessly scrolling on Facebook, losing hours of your day? No More Scroll is designed to help you break free from social media addiction by blocking access to Facebook links, except for those you specifically allow. Whether it's your significant other's profile or learning groups you find valuable, you get to choose what stays accessible. Customize your experience and focus on what truly matters, while avoiding distractions. Stay connected with purpose and regain control of your time.
